title: U.S. Open Preview And Predictions
teaser: Some of the world's greatest tennis plays will step onto the courts over the next few weeks, competing for the Grand Slam title.
contentencoded:
The U.S. Open kicks off today at the USTA Billie Jean King National Tennis Center in New York. Some of the world’s greatest tennis plays will step onto the courts over the next few weeks, competing for the Grand Slam title.

Here & Now’s Robin Young speaks with John Wertheim, executive editor and senior writer for Sports Illustrated, about his predictions for the 2014 U.S. Open.

Guest

  • Jon Wertheim, executive editor and a senior writer for Sports Illustrated. He tweets @jon_wertheim.
